text: our politics just seems so divided and
so angry and so nasty
bigotry seems embolden our politics
seems more vulnerable to conspiracy
theories and outright fabrication
if you have to win a campaign by
dividing people you're not going to be
able to govern them you won't be able to
unite them later bigotry or white
supremacy in any form is blasphemy
against the American creed young people
need positive role models bullying and
Prejudice in our public life sets a
national tone provides permission for
cruelty and bigotry and compromises the
moral education of children the only way
to pass along Civic values is to first
live up to them that was the radical
idea of America that we decided our
direction not some King not some despot
but US citizens and our progress doesn't
always go in a straight line sometimes
we take two steps forward and we might
take a step back
